titles.title: I've found the one of peerless worth

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I've found the one of peerless worth
My heart does sing for joy
And sing I must
for Christ I have
Oh, what a Christ have I!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Christ is my everlasting home
My all-sufficient land
My fortress, tower, hiding place
And my eternal stand

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Christ is the path of endless life
The fullness of our joy
At His right hand our pleasure is
For now and evermore

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
My Christ, the all-inclusive One
My Lord what shall I call
You are the first, You are the last
You are my all in all

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Since such a treasure I possess
My heart does sing for joy
And I must sing and sing again!
Oh, what a Christ have I!

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Oh how i love jesus
oh how i love jesus
oh how i love jesus
because he first loved me
